body.name: Nosiny 6 Set Broom and Dustpan Set with 48 Inches Long Handle with Stand up Dustpan Combo Set Large Size and Stiff Broom Dust Pan for Office Kitchen Lobby Floor Use
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 19 mins
features: Ideal Size for Convenient Cleaning: the broom and dustpan size, over about 48 inches/ 122 cm total height and about 12.2 inches/ 31 cm width, coupled with a lobby broom with a steel handle of about 47.24 inches/ 120 cm long and a lobby dustpan with steel handle of 35.83 inches/ 91 cm long, makes stand up cleaning available, the optimal size of the broom dustpan set reduces the need for bending over, offering a convenience and comfortable cleaning experience

Upright Dustpan Design: featuring an upright dustpan design that allows for quick and easy cleanup, the exquisite design of broom with stand up dustpan minimizes the manual effort required and makes the cleaning process more efficient

Convenient Comb Teeth: the upright dustpan comes with a built in comb for easy cleaning of the broom, simply drag the broom through the teeth of the comb to remove hair and rubbish, eliminating the need for manual cleaning, which makes maintenance of the broom and dustpan significantly easier

Easy to Store: thanks to its compact and thought out design, the broom and dustpan set for home is extremely easy to store, when not in use, the broom fits properly on top of the dustpan, minimizing storage footprint and making it an ideal choice for those with limited storage space

Wide Application: the brooms and dustpans sets can be widely adopted on many different occasions such as kitchens, offices, homes, lobbies and more, they are suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, providing you with a nice using experience
body.description: Features: 180° rotation: The broom and dust pan sets adopt a 180° rotation design, which is easy for you to clean a series of places that are usually difficult to clean, such as the bottom of the bed, sofa, cabinet and more. The dustpan is foldable to prevent trash from falling back down. Classic gray color: The broom and standing dustpan set mainly comes in a classic gray color that is neutral and blends with other decorations. The understated yet stylish color will add exquisite where you store your utility items. It will not take away the aesthetic appeal of the surroundings but will contribute to it. Specifications: Main material: plastic Main color: gray Size: the broom and dustpan size, over about 48 inches/ 122 cm total height and about 12.2 inches/ 31 cm width, coupled with a lobby broom with a steel handle of about 47.24 inches/ 120 cm long and a lobby dustpan with steel handle of 35.83 inches/ 91 cm long Package includes: 6 Sets of broom and standing dustpan sets Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.
